lexa.core.data.formatting

Class DateTimeFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • lexa.core.data.formatting.DateTimeFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Format<java.util.Date>

    public class DateTimeFormat
extends java.lang.Object
implements Format<java.util.Date>
    Helper for serialising the date and time values for a Date object.
    Since:
    2013-08
    Author:
    William

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString(java.util.Date value)
        Description copied from interface: Format
        Formats a value as a string.

        The formatted string this returns should will in an equal object when calling fromString(String).

        Formally: 

        value.equals(this.fromString(this.toString(value) == true
        Specified by:
        toString in interface Format<java.util.Date>
